optimization_settings.name: Optimization Settings
optimization_settings.description: Choose optimization mode and temperature tolerance

data_description.optimization_mode:
Comfort: Minimal price optimization, prioritizes stable heating and comfort
Balanced: Moderate optimization with slight temperature variations
Savings: Maximum cost optimization with wider temperature swings
data_description.tolerance:
How much the indoor temperature can vary from target
(±0.2°C deadzone always maintained).

Lower = more stable
Higher = more aggressive cost optimization.

building_characteristics.name: Building Characteristics
building_characteristics.description: Physical properties affecting thermal behavior and prediction accuracy

data_description.thermal_mass:
How quickly your building heats and cools.

Lower (0.5-0.8) = lightweight construction.
Higher (1.5-2.0) = heavy materials like concrete.
data_description.insulation_quality:
Overall heat retention quality.
Higher = better insulation.

Modern (1.5-2.0),
Standard 1990s (0.8-1.2),
Older (0.5-0.8).

domestic_hot_water.name: Domestic Hot Water (DHW)
domestic_hot_water.description: Hot water scheduling and temperature settings

data_description.dhw_target_temp:
Target temperature for hot water storage tank (45-60°C).

Higher temperatures = more stored energy but more electricity consumption.
data_description.dhw_schedules: Select which heating periods to enable. Uncheck to disable heating during that period.
data_description.dhw_morning_hour: Hour when morning hot water heating should start.
data_description.dhw_evening_hour: Hour when evening hot water heating should start.
